title: card.usage Response Application Programming Interface (API) Schema

seconds.description: The number of seconds in the period

time.description: The time at the beginning of the period

bytes_sent.description: The number of bytes sent during the period

bytes_received.description: The number of bytes received during the period

bytes_pending.description: The number of bytes pending to be sent

notes_sent.description: The number of Notes sent during the period

notes_received.description: The number of Notes received during the period

notes_pending.description: The number of Notes pending to be sent

syncs.description: The number of sync operations during the period

requested.description: The number of sync operations requested by the host during the period

completed.description: The number of sync operations completed during the period

failed.description: The number of sync operations that failed during the period

minutes_connected.description: The number of minutes connected during the period

minutes_cellular.description: The number of minutes connected to the cellular network during the period

minutes_charging.description: The number of minutes charging during the period

minutes_powered.description: The number of minutes powered during the period

minutes_usb.description: The number of minutes connected to USB during the period

minutes_active.description: The number of minutes active during the period

voltage_min.description: The minimum voltage during the period

voltage_max.description: The maximum voltage during the period

voltage_begin.description: The voltage at the beginning of the period

voltage_end.description: The voltage at the end of the period

temp_min.description: The minimum temperature during the period

temp_max.description: The maximum temperature during the period

temp_begin.description: The temperature at the beginning of the period

temp_end.description: The temperature at the end of the period
